# TODO markers in DSL
* Using [this](http://blogs.itemis.de/stundzig/archives/827) blog post as starting point
* ![Task tags in editor](joergreichert.github.io/XtextPlayground/images/task_tags_1.png)
* ![Task tags configuration in preference page](joergreichert.github.io/XtextPlayground/images/task_tags_2.png)

# Others
* testing unicode support in grammar, e.g. umlauts in keywords and identifiers
* reference chains, e.g. a.b.c where a is an entity having attribute b typed as entity which itself has an attribute
* importing existing ecore packages and referencing their elements inside the DSL
